name: Beneath The Streetlamp (Level 2 Beta)
description:
Beneath the Streetlamp is my BFA Thesis game (Cleveland Institute of Art, 2019) where you are given a poem describing a place where two lovers will meet, and you must find the clues within the poem to make that place. This is a version with the beta of Level 2 added on, pretty please give me feedback on how the game made you feel and if there were any bugs you experienced!

There are a couple initial bugs that I am aware of and am in the process of fixing:

  • Issues with the tree asset in level one overlapping the level one UI
  • occasionally there will be an issue with the level 2 cinematic frames where they won't appear in the correct order
  • certain buttons don't resize when hovered over in level 2
  • particle effects in level 2 are not visible for all items except necklace placement

Please let me know if you experience any others and stay tuned for updates, reworks, and news!
